name: Alolan Marowak GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Fiery Bone
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Lost Boomerang GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. If a Pokémon is Knocked Out by this damage, put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
